sneakers.title: sneakers adidas x lego® superstar
sneakers.descr: Add the unique adidas x LEGO® Superstar to your sneaker collection. This adidas / LEGO Group collaboration version features iconic adidas Superstar graphics, Shell Toe, Shamrock and Serrated Three Stripes. She even has real laces. The construction set comes in a special box, similar to the usual one, but with LEGO parts. But the fun part is 17 additional LEGO elements with which you can change and customize your sneakers.
